smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MyViewPagerFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class ContactsAdapter is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class EditContactActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class ViewContactActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class VcfImporter is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class ContactsHelper is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function bindView has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: activity cannot be safely cast to SimpleActivity.
fragment_list.adapter cannot be safely cast to GroupsAdapter.
fragment_list.adapter cannot be safely cast to ContactsAdapter.
contacts.filter { it.starred == 1 } cannot be safely cast to ArrayList<Contact>.
contacts.filter { contactSources.contains(it.source) } cannot be safely cast to ArrayList<Contact>.
storedGroups.asSequence().sortedWith(compareBy { it.title.normalizeString() }).toMutableList() cannot be safely cast to ArrayList<Group>.
activity cannot be safely cast to SimpleActivity.
it cannot be safely cast to Group.
fragment_list.adapter cannot be safely cast to GroupsAdapter.
currAdapter cannot be safely cast to GroupsAdapter.
activity cannot be safely cast to SimpleActivity.
it cannot be safely cast to Contact.
fragment_list.adapter cannot be safely cast to ContactsAdapter.
currAdapter cannot be safely cast to ContactsAdapter.

contactsIgnoringSearch.filter {
                getProperText(it.getNameToDisplay(), shouldNormalize).contains(text, true) ||
                        getProperText(it.nickname, shouldNormalize).contains(text, true) ||
                        it.doesContainPhoneNumber(text, convertLetters) ||
                        it.emails.any { it.value.contains(text, true) } ||
                        it.addresses.any { getProperText(it.value, shouldNormalize).contains(text, true) } ||
                        it.IMs.any { it.value.contains(text, true) } ||
                        getProperText(it.notes, shouldNormalize).contains(text, true) ||
                        getProperText(it.organization.company, shouldNormalize).contains(text, true) ||
                        getProperText(it.organization.jobPosition, shouldNormalize).contains(text, true) ||
                        it.websites.any { it.contains(text, true) }
            } cannot be safely cast to ArrayList.
fragment_wrapper.parent cannot be safely cast to ViewGroup.
activity cannot be safely cast to SimpleActivity.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (config.showTabs and CONTACTS_TAB_MASK == 0 && this is ContactsFragment) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: config.showTabs and CONTACTS_TAB_MASK == 0 && this is ContactsFragment

Parentheses in (config.showTabs and FAVORITES_TAB_MASK == 0 && this is FavoritesFragment) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: config.showTabs and FAVORITES_TAB_MASK == 0 && this is FavoritesFragment
Parentheses in (config.showTabs and GROUPS_TAB_MASK == 0 && this is GroupsFragment) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: config.showTabs and GROUPS_TAB_MASK == 0 && this is GroupsFragment
Parentheses in (Index(value = ["id"], unique = true)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Index(value = ["id"], unique = true)
Parentheses in (Index(value = ["id"], unique = true)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Index(value = ["id"], unique = true)

Parentheses in (showLetters && (convertedName.contains(text, true) || company.contains(text, true))) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: showLetters && (convertedName.contains(text, true) || company.contains(text, true))
Parentheses in (contact!!.id == 0 && action == Intent.ACTION_INSERT) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: contact!!.id == 0 && action == Intent.ACTION_INSERT

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.
